Verses: 1 un Sagodharanudaiya Maadaavadhu Aadaavadhu Vazhithappippogiradhaik Kandaayaanaal, Adhaik Kaanaadhavanpol Iraamal, Adhai Un Sagodharanidaththukkuth Thiruppikkondu Pogakkadavaai.

2 un Sagodharan Unakkuch Sameebamaayiraamalum Unakku Arimugamaayiraamalum Irundhaal, Nee Adhai Un Veettirkuk Kondupoi, Adhai Un Sagodharan Thedivarumattum Unnidaththilevaiththu, Avanukkuth Thirumbak Kodukkakkadavaai.

3 appadiye Avan Kazhudhaiyaikkuriththum Seyyakkadavaai; Avan Vasthiraththaikkuriththum Appadiye Seyyakkadavaai; Un Sagodharanidaththilirundhu Kaanaamarponavaigalil Edhaiyaagilum Kandupidiththaayaanaal Appadiye Seyyakkadavaai; Avaigalai Nee Kaanaadhavanpol Vittuppogalaagaadhu.

4 un Sagodharanudaiya Kazhudhaiyaavadhu Avanudaiya Maadaavadhu Vazhiyile Vizhundhukidakkiradhaik Kandaayaanaal, Adhaik Kaanaadhavanpola Vittuppogaamal, Avanodekooda Adhaith Thookkiyeduththuviduvaayaaga.
5 purusharin Udaigalai Sthireegal Tharikkalaagaadhu, Sthireegalin Udaigalaip Purushar Tharikkalaagaadhu; Appadich Seygiravargal Ellaarum Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Aruvaruppaanavargal.

6 vazhiyaruge Oru Maraththilaavadhu Tharaiyilaavadhu Kunjugalaayinum Muttaigalaayinumulla Oru Kuruvikkoodu Unakkuththenpadumbodhu, Thaayaanadhu Kunjugalinmelaavadhu Muttaigalinmelaavadhu Adaikaaththukkondirundhaal, Nee Kunjugalode Thaayaiyum Pidikkalaagaadhu.
7 thaayaip Pogavittu, Kunjugalaimaaththiram Eduththukkollalaam; Appozhudhu Nee Nandraayiruppaai; Un Naatgalum Neediththirukkum.
8 nee Pudhuveettaik Kattinaal, Oruvan Un Meththaiyilirundhu Vizhugiradhinaale, Nee Raththappazhiyai Un Veettinmel Sumaththikkollaadhabadikku, Adharkuk Kaippidisuvaraik Kattavendum.
9 un Thiraatchaththottaththile Parpalavidhamaana Vidhaiyai Vidhaikkaayaaga; Ippadich Seydhaal Nee Vidhaiththavaigalin Payiraiyum, Thiraatchaththottaththin Balanaiyum Theettuppaduththuvaai.
10 maattaiyum Kazhudhaiyaiyum Pinaiththu Uzhaadhiruppaayaaga.
11 aattumayirum Panjunoolum Kalandha Vasthiraththai Uduththikkollaayaaga.
12 nee Thariththukkolgira Un Mel Sattaiyin Naangu Orangalilum Thongalgalai Undupannuvaayaaga.
13 oru Sthireeyai Vivaagampannina Oruvan Avalidaththil Piravesiththapinbu Avalai Veruththu:
14 naan Indha Sthireeyai Vivaagampanni, Avalidaththil Serndhapodhu Kannimaiyaik Kaanavillai Endru Avalmel Aavalaadhiyaana Viseshangalaich Saatri, Avalukku Avadhooru Undaakkinaal;
15 andha Sthireeyin Thagappanum Aval Thaayum Avaludaiya Kannimaiyin Adaiyaalaththaip Pattanaththu Vaasalilulla Moopparidaththil Konduvarakkadavargal.
16 ange Andhap Pennin Thagappan: En Magalai Indha Manidhanukku Manaiviyaagak Koduththen, Ivan Avalai Veruththu,

17 naan Un Magalidaththil Kannimaiyaik Kaanavillaiyendru Aavalaadhiyaana Viseshangalai Avalmel Saatrugiraan; En Magaludaiya Kannimaiyin Adaiyaalam Inge Irukkiradhu Endru Moopparidaththil Solvaanaaga; Pinbu Pattanaththu Moopparukku Munbaaga Andha Vasthiraththai Virikkakkadavargal.
18 appozhudhu Andhap Pattanaththu Mooppar Andha Manidhanaip Pidiththu, Avanaith Thandiththu,

19 avan Isravelil Oru Kanniyai Avadhoorupanninadhinaale, Avan Kaiyil Nooru Vellikkaasai Aparaadhamaaga Vaangi, Pennin Thagappanukkukkodukkakkadavargal; Avalo Avanukku Manaiviyaayirukkavendum; Avan Than Jeevanullalavum Avalaith Thallividakkoodaadhu.
20 andhap Pennidaththil Kannimai Kaanappadavillaiyennum Sangadhi Meyppattadheyaanaal,

21 andhap Pennai Aval Thagappanudaiya Veettuvaasalukku Munbaagak Konduvandhu, Aval Isravelil Madhiketta Kaariyaththaich Seydhu, Than Thagappan Veettile Vesiththanampanninabadiyinaale, Avaludaiya Pattanaththu Manidhar Avalaik Kallerindhu Kollakkadavargal; Ippadiye Theemaiyai Un Naduvilirundhu Vilakkakkadavaai.

22 purushanukku Vivaagampannappatta Sthireeyode Oruvan Sayanikkak Kandupidikkappattaal, Andha Sthireeyode Sayaniththa Manidhanum Andha Sthireeyum Iruvarum Saagavendum; Ippadiye Theemaiyai Isravelilirundhu Vilakkakkadavaai.
23 kannigaiyaana Oru Pen Oruvanukku Niyamikkappattirukkaiyil, Matroruvan Avalai Oorukkulle Kandu, Avalode Sayaniththaal,

24 appozhudhu Andhap Pen Oorukkullirundhum Kookkuralidaadhadhinaalum, Andha Manidhan Piranudaiya Manaiviyaik Karpazhiththapadiyinaalum, Iruvaraiyum Andhap Pattanaththu Vaasalukkumun Kondupoi, Avargalmel Kallerindhu Kollakkadaveergal; Ippadiye Theemaiyai Un Naduvilirundhu Vilakkakkadavaai.
25 oruvanukku Niyamikkappatta Pennai Veliyile Oruvan Kandu, Avalaip Balavandhamaaip Pidiththu, Avalode Sayaniththaaneyaagil, Avalode Sayaniththa Manidhan Maaththiram Saagakkadavan.
26 pennukku Ondrum Seyyalaagaadhu; Penninmel Saavukku Edhuvaana Kutram Illai; Ikkaariyam Oruvan Matroruvanmel Ezhumbi Avanudaiya Jeevanai Vaanginadhupola Irukkiradhu.
27 veliyile Avan Avalaik Kandupidiththaan; Niyamikkappatta Pen Appozhudhu Kookkuralittum Avalaik Kaappaatruvaar Illaamarpoyitru.
28 niyamikkappadaadha Kanniyaasthireeyaagiya Oru Pennai Oruvan Kandu, Kaiyaip Pidiththu Avalode Sayanikkaiyil, Avargal Kandupidikkappattaal,

29 avalode Sayaniththa Manidhan Pennin Thagappanukku Aimbadhu Vellikkaasaik Kodukkakkadavan; Avan Avalaik Karpazhiththabadiyinaal, Aval Avanukku Manaiviyaayirukkavendum; Avan Uyirodirukkumalavum Avalaith Thallivitakkoodaadhu.
30 oruvanum Than Thagappanudaiya Manaiviyaich Seralaagaadhu; Than Thagappan Maanaththai Avan Velippaduththalaagaadhu.
